data.title: Master-Touch Series: Charcoal BBQs
data.meta_description: Master-Touch charcoal BBQs: grill, roast and smoke with one versatile kettle BBQ ✔One-Touch cleaning system ► Buy your Master-Touch barbecue online!
data.text:
Let the Master-Touch Series take you on a culinary adventure

If you want to become a true master of culinary adventure, then you should choose one of the charcoal barbecues from the Weber Master-Touch Series. All of these top-notch barbecues feature unique hinged lids to keep the delicious flavours of your favourite dishes locked in.

Grilling your favourites like burgers and sausages

The Gourmet Barbecue System (GBS) is featured across the Master-Touch range, so you can have confidence in preparing a variety of tasty dishes for friends and family. From quarter-pounders to chunky frankfurters, you’ll be cooking up a feast of barbecued favourites with the Weber Master-Touch barbecue.

Try pizza or breakfast with the Weber Master-Touch Series

With its bowl venting feature, the GBS cooking grate allows you to cook up a sumptuous selection of breakfasts, summer chillies, and pizzas. The “smoke” setting can be easily adjusted for extra control over the temperature of your barbecue.

Transform your kettle into a smoker for pulled pork or fall-off-the-bone ribs

Added heat control makes it easier than ever to barbecue your pulled pork or fall off-the-bone ribs. You can monitor the temperature of such melt-in-your-mouth treats with the built-in lid thermometer for perfect results and that unique barbecue unique, smoky barbecue flavour every time.

Get to know the Weber Master-Touch Series

Having specialised in the design of perfect barbecues since 1952, we’ve applied our superior know-how in the creation of the versatile and high-performance Master-Touch. Whether you prefer to barbecue or smoke, the wide selection of GBS inserts opens up a world of culinary opportunities.

The Master-Touch Barbecue

We wanted to take the classic kettle BBQ to the next level and equipped it with premium features that will make grilling even for bigger groups a walk in the park. While you can also walk your Master-Touch Barbecue to the park for a lovely get-together, it will make gatherings in your backyard a fantastic experience for all your guests and yourself.

Additional features of the Master-Touch Barbecue include:

Tuck-away lid holder

Stainless-steel one-touch cleaning system

Safety-enhancing iGrill bracket

Char-basket charcoal fuel holders

Tool hooks

Easy-grip damper handle

Removable, high-capacity aluminium ash catcher

Durable all-weather 20cm rubber-moulded wheels

The Master-Touch Premium Barbecue

Building on the high-performance cooking capabilities of the Master-Touch, Weber introduces the ultimate 3-in-1 barbecue. Also featuring the GBS sear grate, the Weber Master-Touch Premium allows for the cooking of grill-steaks, roasts, and much more besides.

The Premium Weber Master-Touch 57cm comes with:

Porcelain-enamelled char ring

Stainless steel diffuser plate

Gourmet BBQ system stainless steel hinged cooking grates

Char-basket charcoal fuel holders.

Weber Master-Touch Series – frequently asked questions

How to use the Weber Master-Touch BBQ?

Barbecue the Weber way, following the 3 principles of keeping the lid down, selecting the right cooking method, and using one of our iGrills and thermometers. If you’d like expert guidance in the use of your charcoal barbecue then sign up for one of the Grill Academy courses.

How to light the Weber Master-Touch?

You can make the lighting of your Weber Master-Touch as safe and easy as possible with charcoal briquettes and accessories.

This four-step process should be followed when using the Rapidfire Compact Chimney Starter:

Measure out the amount of charcoal specified in the recipe using the briquette scoop (which was included free with your Weber charcoal barbecue) and pour into the Chimney Starter.

Light three lighter cubes on the coal grate.

Position the Chimney Starter over the cubes.

Wait until flames appear at the top of the Chimney Starter. This is a sign that the coals are glowing.

Shake the glowing coals into the grilling baskets (beware of sparks!). That’s it!

How can I clean my Weber Master-Touch barbecue?

Regular maintenance will be essential if you want to keep your Weber Master-Touch barbecue looking its best all year round. We’ve made this process as easy as possible, with features such as the one-touch cleaning system. You should also buy BBQ cleaning brushes for the effective removal of food remnants from the cooking grate.

Here’s the recommended grate-cleaning process:

Ensure your barbecue has cooled.

Spray on the Weber® Grate Cleaner and leave to sit for 30 seconds.

Brush off the grate with a stainless steel bristle brush and then wipe clean with a wet sponge.

Which colours are the Weber Master-Touch barbecues available in?

Weber Master-Touch barbecues are available in a range of colours to suit your tastes. You can buy the Weber Master-Touch in black, deep ocean blue, slate blue, or smoke grey. The 70th Anniversary Edition Kettle Charcoal Barbecue comes in a hand-enamelled Hollywood Grey, reminiscent of classic films from the 1950s era. No detail is spared when you buy from Weber.

Which accessories for the Master-Touch Series are recommended?

Weber offers a wide variety of BBQ accessories to help you cook, clean, and care for your Master-Touch barbecue. You can ensure protection against the elements with one of our specially-made barbecue covers.

Other recommended Weber Master-Touch accessories include:

iGrill 2

Premium gloves

Griddle

Find your charcoal BBQ from the Weber Master-Touch Series
